document.docAuthor: Clarkson, Bruno, Santos, André Dias Dos & Ferreira-Jr, Nelson
document.masterDocTitle: On Brazilian Helobata Bergroth, 1888 (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae): description of two new species, new records, and key to species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: On Brazilian Helobata Bergroth, 1888 (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae): description of two new species, new records, and key to species

heading.emphasis:
Checklist of
Helobata
Bergroth, 1888
from Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph: (*) denotes new records. Additional comments on specific cases are found below.

Helobata amazonensis
sp. nov. Brazil
: Amazonas (*).

bibRefCitation.author: Fernandez
bibRefCitation.refString: Fernandez, L. A. & Bachmann, A. O. (1987) Revision del genero Helobata Bergroth (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae). Revista de la Sociedad Entomologica Argentina, 45 (1 - 5), 145 - 151.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Helobata pantaneira
sp. nov. Brazil
: Mato Grosso State (*).

bibRefCitation.author: Fernandez
bibRefCitation.refString: Fernandez, L. A. & Bachmann, A. O. (1987) Revision del genero Helobata Bergroth (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae). Revista de la Sociedad Entomologica Argentina, 45 (1 - 5), 145 - 151.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Brazil
: Pará (
Fernández & Bachmann 1987 : 158
), Rio de Janeiro 2 (*).
1 —In 1975 , Mato Grosso State was divided into Mato Grosso and Mato Grosso do Sul States. Actually, Corumbá is localized in Mato Grosso do Sul State.

2 —These specimens correspond to the unidentified
Helobata
recorded from Rio de Janeiro State (RJ) by Ferreira- Jr et al . ( 1998 ) and Santos et al . ( 2010 ).
